Title: Hanes Ultimate Comfort Flex Fit Ultra Soft Mens 4 Pack Boxer Briefs
Description:
If you're looking for comfort and performance in men's underwear, look to Hanes Ultimate® Comfort Flex Fit® boxer briefs. The remarkable comfort starts with a breathable, supportive pouch. Knit from Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture to keep you cool and comfortable; these stretch cotton/modal boxer briefs also feature advanced odor protection technology that fights odor-causing bacteria. And there's even more comfort built in - the Comfort Flex® stretch waistband moves with you while no-ride-up leg bands are designed to stay smoothly in place. Finished with a tag-free interior, these moisture-wicking boxer briefs are available in a convenient assorted 4-pack for stock-up ease.

Title: PGA Tour Motionflux 360 Performance Golf Shorts
Description:
When you bend down to gauge your last winning putt, the last thing you want is for your shorts to rip and break in the wrong places. Our PGA TOUR Men's Motionflux 360 Golf Performance Active Waistband Shorts have a comfort waistband that is expandable and moves with you when you bend, stretch, run, whatever you decide to do. With stretchy, flexible technology and powerful moisture-wicking features that keep you dry and protected on the course—you’ll be hard-pressed to find a better choice for premium golf wear.
Part of our MotionFlux 360 Collection: These men’s golf shirts, pants and shorts feature our most flexible seams and stretchy fabrics for a greater range of motion.
Where/How to Wear: On the course, on the court or even when you're having a midday lunch with the boys. Pair these men’s polo golf shorts with a PGA TOUR men's polo shirt to complete the look.
